game.name: 2D Crazy Basketball
game.description:
Playing street basketball is a dream of many young boy. However, only a few get an opportunity to make it come true. Today we have got you covered with a brand new sports game where you can polish your basketball skills while exploring the biggest fun opportunities online. All you need to do is just tap and hold the ball and drag it into your desired direction. Join 2D Crazy Basketball and be prepared to shoot appropriately and make some good score!

There are 5 unique and tricky parts to explore and you have to challenge your basketball handling abilities to pass these challenging stages. The more skillful you are, the higher points you would be able to score in the end. Aim your target perfectly with the ball by showing off your skills in this HTML5 basketball game! Select from multiple scenarios and get ready to customize your sight as per your needs!

Use your hand-eye coordination skills, play some smart moves and see how many balls you are able to net in before you lose! Track your score on the screen in the end and know many balls you have passed through the basketball net! You would have only 5 balls to lose and play with so try to be careful while aiming your net. Choose your difficulty level and get ready to create your best high score and share your score with your friends and families!
